criteria.description: Reward tiers clearly differentiate exact count vs off-by-one vs larger misses, with documented values.
criteria.justification: Exact match gets 1.0; otherwise linear penalty 1 - error/target differentiates off-by-one vs larger misses, but not explicitly tiered or documented.

criteria.description: Theme adherence check influences reward or metadata.
criteria.justification: No keyword/similarity/LLM check for theme adherence; reward ignores theme.

criteria.description: Prompt themes are varied, and not just one theme repeated.
criteria.justification: Two distinct themes ('adventure', 'mystery'); meets non-repetition requirement.

criteria.description: More than 10 examples are seeded in the environment.
criteria.justification: Only 2 prompts provided; does not exceed 10.

criteria.description: Output sanitizer enforces plain text (no markup) and strips leading/trailing whitespace before scoring.
criteria.justification: Leading/trailing whitespace stripped before scoring; no enforcement or removal of markup/plain-text check.

notes: Minor bug: rollout indexes prompts with step % len(get_prompt) instead of len(PROMPTS), which would raise a TypeError. Metadata includes a string 'error' on exception, which may violate scalar-only guidance. No theme adherence scoring and few seeded prompts.
